name: Water Escape (User8426)
description:
A game created for Goedware game jam 6 with the theme of absorption.

As a small puddle of water, you have to move around the level, and try to be absorbed. Although you cant move, the level can and gravity will bring you closer to your goal.

Controls

AD - Rotate Camera

Q - Slow Motion

R - Restart

ESC - Quit a level / Finish a percentage level

Mouse Wheel - Camera Zoom

Credits

User8426 - Creating anything not mentioned here

GDevelop 5 -Game Engine

https://pixwlk.itch.io/petaporon and Garageband - Create music

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8hj0wyFxSOs - Tutorial for music

Zapslat - sfx

https://bsl.itch.io/new-hi-score - font
